Text:
Is there a keygen or crack necessary? Is there an NFO file with steps on how to install it and beat the authorization? 

It's really great that you upload the coolness, but it'd be nice to know if it's worth the time downloading as well, because without cracks it's not of much practical use, and without instructions you'll have a flood of knuckleheads coming in the comments soon to whinge about not knowing what their C drive is, or how to burn this or why their's so many .rar  files lol. You know how it is bro :). Not being an idiot Neil, just sayin'.  Anyways, thanks for the big up amigo. :)
